title: MSM Spins the Million MAGA March | Guest: Alan Dershowitz | 11/16/20
description:
Glenn goes on full-fledged duct tape alert after Obama’s latest agonizing "60 Minutes" interview. Joe Biden’s top state media appointee is “not against propaganda." Canadian PM Justin Trudeau said we need to “build back better” with the Great Reset. The media is misreporting on the “Million MAGA March” and Antifa violence, but BlazeTV’s Elijah Schaffer was there. Dominion Voting Systems’ Wikipedia page has had a lot of changes made recently. Attorney Alan Dershowitz explains why he thinks Trump could flip Pennsylvania and another possible way Trump could win the election. Glenn debates listeners on the purpose of marching and whether fighting back is acceptable. Megyn Kelly gave a shoutout to Stu’s Andrew Cuomo COVID timeline.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
